name: Side Switch (Salmoneer)
description:
Side Switch

Run to the other side of the screen to pickup the powerup and switch which way around you play! Do this several times to get to the end of the level. However, make sure to avoid spikes and pits, as they are deadly and restart the game.

Controls:
W, UP ARROW, SPACE: Jump
A, LEFT ARROW: Left
D, RIGHT ARROW: Right

Made for the Geojam 2021. Please Note that this game was submitted the following day, curtesy of Icoso, however the game was done and hasn't been modified since the competition ended, we just couldn't submit in time.
Made by myself (Salmoneer) and my friend, I8achopstick (who doesn't have an account) in a week.
